name: The next archmage
description:
The story so far

"Little mage, the council gave you an important mission. You need to defend this defenseless village against monsters. We don't know how much of them they are. Try to hold you're position has long as you can."

- Council's Archmage Master

They gave you a book with some usefull offensive spells. Just type the word to cast the spell.

  • air tornado
  • ice pick
  • poison claw
  • shadow ball
  • light aura
  • time stop

But don't forget you can move by using special word :

  • up
  • down
Concept

You type the spells's name on your keyboard and they will be cast in front of you. Note that you can fail your cast if you enter a bad mix of keyword, like "ice ball" for example.

Mode - done - Anarchy

Random monsters will spawns and your village can only handle 1000 damage. The damage are the current life of monsters when they reach the city. There is no timer. The score is the amount of damage deal during the round.

- In development - Story

The story of the little mage that want to become an archmage. Same concept as Anarchy but the "waves" will be predefined, and your objective will be to survive all the waves. You'll unlock spells, and maybe spells upgrade.

- In development - Strategy

Really hard waves come to you. They are predefined. But you will have restriction. The goal can change depending on the level selected, time or kill.
